attributes.action: Reduce the cost of petrol / diesel until alternatives are beneficial
attributes.additional_details:
the current cost of motoring is going through the roof.

Common people are finding travelling to and from work becoming a major expense upon their wage.

The tax on fuel should be reduced and recouped elsewhere such as less beneficial areas such as alcohol or cigarettes.

Public transport is not always an alternative and motoring is becoming a luxury and when people are finding work hard have to travel further afield. but with no benefit thanks to the massive cost of motoring.
